messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Re: Guilty schoolers
messages.msgSnippet: -work can’t be fun -work and play are two separate things -you have to suffer sometimes in order to be able to appreciate the good times For more, read Jean
messages.messageBody:
-work cant be fun
-work and play are two separate things
-you have to suffer sometimes in order to be able to appreciate the good
times

For more, read Jean Liedloffs The Continuum Concept.

Elsa Haas


-----Original Message-----
From: center for intuitive learning [mailto:suzee@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 1:31 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Re: Guilty schoolers

hi unschoolers,

let's take a look at some of the assumptions we have to deal with...
(in ourselves and others) - please add to this list:
-life is hard, that's the way it is
-nothing good comes easy
-
-
-


--
